jobDescription: Company is currently looking for a Business Analyst for the San Francisco Bay Area. The Business Analyst would be responsible for a variety of the following tasks  Support and maintenance for a financial IT system, including developing and implementing new Organizationules for cost reporting  Identify opportunities to improve and upgrade the system, including gathering user requirements, setting priorities and presenting to management  Troubleshoot and resolve system issues in timely manner to improve the overall quality of the data and the user experience  Interface with IT team to provide system feedback and resolve complex issues  Develop and provide user training, including documentation of standard processes and issues  Routine reporting to management to ensure program requirements are being met  Required Qualifications  BA/BS degree and 4 years relevant work experience  Outstanding communication, project management & prioritization skills  Ability to work in fast paced environment with cross functional teams
